code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignUp(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:'',lastName:'',email:'',username:'',password:'',major:'',courses:[]});const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const[errorMessage,setErrorMessage]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const
